title: Environmental group appeals permit allowing transport of coal ash up Ohio, Mon rivers
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Environment - Today 
The Sierra Club has appealed a state permit that allows FirstEnergy Corp to transport up to 17 million tons of coal ash 113 miles by barge u...
